name: Rising Stomach Acid
description:
The Game

The players goal is to collect all the food in order to beat his own highscore and prevent the stomach acid from rising.

Purpose

The game was created within the Weekly Game Jam (Week 31) with the topic "Digestion". If you like the game or you have any feedback for me that let me know. I will try to get my hands on this game in the future again.

Controls KEYFUNCTIONWMove UpA
